name: Computer Center
headline: Empowering Minds through Modern Tools
details: Our fully equipped ICT Centre is designed for training, workshops, and research. Whether you're hosting a digital skills seminar or facilitating online courses, our 50-capacity tech-friendly hall offers fast internet, modern systems, and a conducive learning environment.

name: Event Hall

details: Our 300-seater Event Hall and beautiful open-air reception space provide the ideal backdrop. With reliable power, serene surroundings, and flexible seating arrangements
